code: import{useEffect}from"react";import Axios from"axios";export function VerificaLogin(){useEffect(function(){var id=localStorage.getItem('id');var token=localStorage.getItem('token');getUser(id,token);});function getUser(id,token){Axios.get('http://localhost:3001/conexoesUsuarios',{params:{id:id,token:token}}).then(function(response){var dadosDoServidor=response.data;if(dadosDoServidor.length===0){localStorage.removeItem('id');localStorage.removeItem('token');window.location.href="/login";}});}}
